displayOptions.label: Label
displayOptions.helptext: This field is used to identify this page in the CMS. This label won't never be visibel on the website.

displayOptions.label: Show French
displayOptions.question_label: This link is available in French

displayOptions.label: Show Dutch
displayOptions.question_label: This link is available in Dutch

displayOptions.label: Show English
displayOptions.question_label: This link is available in English

displayOptions.label: Show German
displayOptions.question_label: This link is available in German

displayOptions.label: Url (fr)
displayOptions.helptext: Should contains a absolute link to the web site i.e. '/search?q=publication' ou a fully qualified url (with http or https) i.e. https://www.google.be

displayOptions.label: Meta (fr)
displayOptions.helptext: Use in the title attribute on the link (if blank we use the title)

displayOptions.label: Url (nl)
displayOptions.helptext: Should contains a absolute link to the web site i.e. '/search?q=publication' ou a fully qualified url (with http or https) i.e. https://www.google.be

displayOptions.label: Meta (nl)
displayOptions.helptext: Use in the title attribute on the link (if blank we use the title)

displayOptions.label: Url (en)
displayOptions.helptext: Should contains a absolute link to the web site i.e. '/search?q=publication' ou a fully qualified url (with http or https) i.e. https://www.google.be

displayOptions.label: Meta (en)
displayOptions.helptext: Use in the title attribute on the link (if blank we use the title)

displayOptions.label: Url (de)
displayOptions.helptext: Should contains a absolute link to the web site i.e. '/search?q=publication' ou a fully qualified url (with http or https) i.e. https://www.google.be

displayOptions.label: Meta (de)
displayOptions.helptext: Use in the title attribute on the link (if blank we use the title)

displayOptions.label: Search Dates
displayOptions.helptext: Set to Today if empty. Used by the search engine to sort by date.

displayOptions.label: Gravity
displayOptions.helptext: Only works if resize = Fill Area
displayOptions.choices:
center
north
south
west
east
north-west
north-east
south-west
south-east

displayOptions.label: Background
displayOptions.helptext: For transparent images and if resize = fill

displayOptions.label: Alternate Texts
displayOptions.helptext: Used for the alt tag on the image. Leave empty if the image does not add any extra information to the document.
